items.title: “Cerchiamo di contrapporre a un sistema che vede il paziente come numero uno che lo considera come persona”

"It was really important, because Maja and I did this event at Beijing 2022 and were second, so to win this race was incredible. It felt really nice and safe to be skiing with Maja. It was really fun"
“Vogliamo mantenerli vivi e vivaci – (\*) – perché sanno unire generazioni diverse e raccontare l’identità delle nostre comunità, tra memoria e capacità di rinnovarsi”
“Fue realmente difícil de entender y asimilar”
"Honestly, the skiing is what I cared about," "Of course, a medal and gold, that's a dream come true. But at some point this week, I just said, like, stop dreaming. Just ski"
